mapper.select: SELECT bno, category, title, content, writer, date, (SELECT COUNT(*) AS rno FROM tbl_fbreply WHERE tbl_fbreply.bno = tbl_freeboard.bno) as replycnt FROM tbl_freeboard ORDER BY bno DESC, date DESC ;

SELECT BNO, category, TITLE, CONTENT, WRITER, DATE, HIT, replycnt FROM ( SELECT BNO, category, TITLE, CONTENT, WRITER, DATE, HIT, replycnt, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY BNO DESC) AS RNUM FROM tbl_freeboard WHERE 1=1
) MP WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{rowStart} AND #{rowEnd} ORDER BY BNO DESC

SELECT COUNT(BNO) FROM tbl_freeboard WHERE 1=1
AND BNO > 0

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_fbfile( fno, bno, org_fname, stored_fname, fsize )VALUES( #{fno}, ((select max(bno) from tbl_freeboard)), #{org_fname}, #{stored_fname}, #{fsize} )
